text: Frank Hsieh (; born May 18, 1946) is a Taiwanese politician and attorney. He is a co-founder of the Democratic Progressive Party. He was a member of the Legislative Yuan, mayor of Kaohsiung City, and the Premier of the Republic of China under president Chen Shui-bian. Hsieh was the DPP nominee in the 2008 presidential election and lost to Ma Ying-jeou. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Premiers of the Republic of China on Taiwan Category:Taiwanese lawyers Category:Mayors of Kaohsiung Category:People from Taipei
title: Frank Hsieh
